title: Top 20 Challenger Stream
body:
Starting up a stream, come watch the world renowned Nasus god in action.

Still trying to improve my stream so any constructive criticism is appreciated.

replies.body: So what happened to the stream? Did you get banned?
Yeah nice. Would be nice if you talked over some of the stuff you're doing
Yeah plan on doing that, just need to get a better mic. The only mic i have right now is half a broken headset i used to use, so it's kind of awkward to use.
